title: The Risks and Rewards of Angel Investing
sub_head: The risk is straightforward: You very well could lose all your money. But you could possibly make a lot of money, and have fun while doing it.
body:
It isn’t easy being an angel.
Angel investing—which consists of taking an equity stake in a startup company—is coming back after a pandemic-induced slowdown last year. But there is a lot you should consider before joining the crowd.
